backend/main.mo: IC canister with access control, user profiles, and CRUD backpack item management per principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining the app's color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page containing the root div and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component handling authentication, profile flow, and routing to the backpack UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button for login/logout with II and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for firstâ€‘time profile creation with name input and save action.
App layout wrapper with header, branding, welcome text, and footer.
frontend/src/features/backpack/BackpackP: Backpack dashboard page combining summary stats, item form, list controls, and item list with filtering.
frontend/src/features/backpack/component: Displays an error message and retry button when the backpack fails to load.
Shows skeleton placeholders while backpack data is loading.
Confirmation dialog for deleting an item, triggering a delete mutation and showing status feedback.
Dialog for editing an item with form fields, validation, and an update mutation.
Help dialog explaining how to use the Digital Backpack, with accordion-based instructions.
Form for adding new items with validation and a create-item mutation.
Displays backpack items or empty/filtered states, rendering each item via ItemRow.
Renders a single item row with edit and delete actions and corresponding dialogs.
Search and sort controls for filtering and ordering the item list.
Displays three summary cards showing total items, total quantity, and total weight based on provided backpack items.
frontend/src/features/backpack/state/lis: Filters items by search query and sorts them by name or quantity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations and initialization of backpack items via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme color variables using an earthy palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, image requirements, and existing features for the Digital Backpack app; contains no source logic.
